name: SGI Europe Buddhist Association

membership: SGI Europe Buddhist Association e.V. is a member of Soka Gakkai International, domiciled in Tokyo, Japan
goal:
We are the European branch of the Soka Gakkai International (SGI) a lay Buddhist movement linking together approximately 150,000 members across Europe.
We are active in the fields of peace-building through culture and education based on the humanistic principles of Nichiren Buddhism as practised within the SGI movement
interests: Culture, Education and training, Environment, Humanitarian aid and civil protection, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights
